thread.title: Tech Tonic for investments
thread.title_full: Tech Tonic for investments | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Tech Tonic for investments
text:
In the financial products space, technology-based advice and distribution can significantly alter the market dynamics of both pricing and reach. After the markets regulator tightened commission payouts to distributors, direct online investment in mutual fund has picked up. A Kotak Institutional Equities Research notes direct investment as a proportion to the overall AUM is 13% as of June and is expected to rise. It is easier and cheaper to save directly online and technology is now changing advice as algorithms can identify triggers for movement in portfolio of clients.
First Published on September 01, 2015 12:05 am
